intro.title: üéØ What is it?
intro.text: Image generation is creating a picture from your text description using artificial intelligence. You write what you want to see, and the neural network draws it for you.
intro.text2: You describe the picture in words, press the "Generate" button, and in 10-30 seconds you get a finished image!

steps.title: üöÄ How to generate a photo for the first time (step by step)
steps.step1Text: Write a message to the character in chat (or leave it empty)
steps.step2Text: Press the button with the photo icon (üì∑) under the message input field
steps.step3Text: In the window that opens, you will see pre-filled text ‚Äî this is the description of the future picture
steps.step5Text: If necessary, edit the description (you can write in Russian or English)
steps.step7Text: Done! The photo will appear in the chat

styles.title: üé® Choice of image style (model)
styles.intro: Before generating, you can choose one of three styles:
styles.anime: Classic Anime style ‚Äî bright colors, large eyes, stylized graphics
styles.animeRealism: Anime and Realism mix ‚Äî a mix of anime and realism, more realistic proportions but preserves the anime aesthetic
styles.realism: Maximum Photorealism ‚Äî maximally realistic images, like photographs
styles.tipText: Try all three styles with the same description to see the difference!

whatIsPrompt.title: ‚úçÔ∏è What is a prompt and how to write it?
whatIsPrompt.text1: ‚Äî is a text description of what you want to see in the picture. It's like an instruction for an artist, only a neural network works instead of an artist.
whatIsPrompt.text2: The neural network only remembers the first 40-50 words! Anything written beyond that, it might ignore.

structure.title: üìù Correct prompt structure
structure.intro: To get a good result, write the description in the correct order:
structure.label: Correct order:
structure.ruleText: The most important things should be at the beginning, quality details at the end!

examples.title: ‚úÖ Examples of good prompts
examples.ex1Text: beautiful girl in a red dress standing on a beach at sunset, cinematic lighting, volumetric light rays, beautiful deep shadows, masterpiece
examples.ex2Text: young man in a black suit sitting in a cafe, warm light from a window, city background, cinematic lighting, volumetric light rays, beautiful deep shadows, masterpiece
examples.ex3Text: girl with long hair in a white dress in a garden, flowers in background, sunlight, cinematic lighting, volumetric light rays, beautiful deep shadows, masterpiece

badExamples.title: ‚ùå Examples of bad prompts (what to avoid)
badExamples.label2: Bad (too long, important things at the end):
badExamples.text2: very beautiful picture with good quality, professional photography, high resolution, detailed, girl in a dress
badExamples.problemText: In the first example there is too little information, in the second ‚Äî the important thing (girl in a dress) is at the end, where the neural network might not notice it.

brackets.title: üîß The secret of brackets (if the neural network doesn't "hear")
brackets.text1: If you wrote "blue eyes" and the picture has brown eyes ‚Äî use weight amplification. Write the necessary word in parentheses with a number:
brackets.text2: The neural network will understand: "This is very important, do it by all means!" The number 1.3 means 30% amplification.
brackets.veryStrong: ‚Äî very strong amplification (100%) ‚Äî might distort the image
brackets.exText: girl with (long hair:1.3) in (red dress:1.5) standing on a beach, cinematic lighting, masterpiece

boosters.title: ‚ú® Booster words (always add at the end!)
boosters.text1: To make the picture look juicy, voluminous and professional, always add these words at the very end of the description:
boosters.item1Desc: ‚Äî makes the image look like a movie frame
boosters.item4Desc: ‚Äî signals the neural network for high quality
boosters.importantText: These words can be written in Russian or English ‚Äî the neural network understands them. Always add them to the end of the prompt!

retry.title: üîÑ What to do if you don't like the result?
retry.v1Text: Edit the prompt and generate again. Try changing the word order, adding details or using brackets for important elements
retry.v2Text: Try a different style (Anime and Realism mix, Classic Anime style, Maximum Photorealism) ‚Äî sometimes this radically changes the result
retry.v3Text: Generate several times with the same prompt ‚Äî each time the result will be slightly different
retry.v4Text: Simplify the prompt ‚Äî sometimes less is more. Remove unnecessary details and leave only the most important things

tips.title: üí° Useful tips
tips.tip1Text: The neural network understands both, no need to translate if you don't want to
tips.tip3Text: 30-40 words are usually enough for a good result
tips.tip4Text: Try different combinations of words, styles and settings
tips.tip5Text: If the result is good, remember the prompt for future use

summary.title: üéì Quick memo
summary.item1Text: Important at the beginning, details at the end
summary.item3Text: Always add "cinematic lighting, volumetric light rays, beautiful deep shadows, masterpiece" at the end
summary.item5Text: Experiment with different styles and prompts

step1.title: Create a character
step1.description: Describe the appearance, character and personality of your character. Specify their unique traits and features

step2.title: Chat
step2.description: Engage in dialogue with the character. The AI will respond according to the defined character and personality

step3.title: Generate photos
step3.description: Create photorealistic images of your character in any poses and situations. The AI uses the described appearance

uniqueChar.title: Creating a unique character
uniqueChar.text: You create your character from scratch yourself. Describe every detail: hair and eye color, facial features, physique, clothing style. Define the character: will they be shy or confident, romantic or playful, serious or cheerful.

list.1: Detailed description of appearance: hair, eyes, figure, features
list.2: Character and personality: temperament, manner of communication, habits
list.3: Preferences and interests: hobbies, favorite places, lifestyle
list.4: Unique traits: tattoos, piercings, birthmarks, scars

interactive.title: Interactive communication
interactive.text: After creating a character, you can chat with them in real time. The AI analyzes the character you defined and responds accordingly, creating a natural and lively dialogue.

photoGen.title: Generating photorealistic images
photoGen.text: Based on the described appearance, the AI generates photorealistic images of your character. You can request any pose, location, or situation. The technology uses powerful neural networks to create detailed and realistic images with perfect faces and eyes.

about.title: About project
about.intro: Welcome to CandyGirlsChat ‚Äî an innovative platform where cutting-edge AI technologies meet boundless imagination.
about.description: Our mission is to create the most realistic and immersive experience possible when interacting with virtual companions. We believe that modern LLMs (Large Language Models) are capable of much more than just answering questions ‚Äî they can be full participants in role-played adventures, capable of empathy, humor, and surprise.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: We strive to blur the line between human and machine in digital communication, providing users with a safe space for self-expression and the exploration of their boldest fantasies.

technology.title: Technology
technology.text: CandyGirlsChat is built upon the latest neural networks for natural language processing and visual content generation. Our engineers continuously train models to ensure every character has a unique 'voice', memory, and personality.

list.1: Maximum Realism: Characters remember the context of the conversation and grow with you.
list.2: Roleplay Without Borders: We have no rigid filters on plots ‚Äî your imagination is the only limit.
list.3: Visualization: Every character can generate photos matching the current situation.
list.4: Constant Growth: We add new characters and features every single week.

about.access: Basic access to the service is free. For those who want more, we offer premium plans with expanded generation capabilities and no limits.

offer.title: Offer Agreement
offer.intro: This document is an official offer (public offer) of Kretsu Vasile (TIN 772426525886), providing access to an online image generation service using artificial intelligence technologies.

1.title: 1. Subject of the Agreement
1.text:
1.1. The Contractor provides the Customer with access to the service functionality after payment of the selected plan.
1.2. Services are provided remotely, in electronic form.
1.3. The service provides the ability to create personalized characters, generate images, and interact with artificial intelligence.
1.4. Access to the service is provided via a web interface after user registration and authorization.

2.title: 2. Procedure for Granting Access
2.text:
2.1. After payment is completed, access is granted automatically in the user's personal account.
2.2. The volume of available functions depends on the selected plan (FREE, STANDARD, PREMIUM).
2.3. The fact of payment is confirmed by an electronic receipt.
2.4. Subscription renewal is possible at any time before the current period expires.

3.title: 3. Payment for Services
3.text:
3.1. Payment is made by non-cash method through connected payment systems (YooKassa, YooMoney, FPS).
3.2. The cost of plans is indicated on the website and may be changed by the Contractor unilaterally, while changes do not apply to already paid services.
3.3. Services are not subject to VAT (Art. 346.11 of the Tax Code of the Russian Federation).
3.4. Payment is considered made from the moment funds are credited to the Contractor's account.

4.title: 4. Refund Policy
4.text:
4.1. Refunds are made if access to the service was not provided due to a technical error on the part of the Contractor.
4.2. A refund request is sent to the support service email pixotujepayo06@gmail.com within 14 days from the date of payment.
4.3. Refunds are not made if the service was actually rendered (access provided and used).
4.4. Refunds are made to the same payment instrument from which the payment was made, within 10 working days.
4.5. When making a refund, the Contractor has the right to withhold the commission of payment systems, if applied.

5.title: 5. Rights and Obligations of the Parties
5.text:
5.1. The Customer undertakes to use the service in accordance with its purpose and not to violate the rights of third parties.
5.2. The Contractor undertakes to ensure the operability of the service within technical capabilities.
5.3. The Contractor is not responsible for the inability to use the service for reasons beyond their control (technical failures of providers, actions of third parties, etc.).
5.4. The Customer is responsible for the confidentiality of their credentials and for all actions performed under their account.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy matters to us. This Privacy Policy describes what data we collect, how we use it, and how we protect it.

1.title: 1. Introduction
1.text: This Privacy Policy (the "Policy") applies to the Candy Girls Chat service (the "Service") and describes the procedure for processing users' personal data in accordance with applicable data protection laws.

list.1: Personal Data ‚Äî any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person
list.2: Processing of Personal Data ‚Äî any action with personal data, including collection, recording, systematization, accumulation, storage, clarification, extraction, use, transfer, depersonalization, blocking, deletion, destruction

1.title: 3.1. Data You Provide
1.text: When registering and using the Service, we may collect the following information:

list.1: Contact Information: email address
list.2: Account Credentials: username, password (encrypted)
list.3: Payment Information: data for processing payments (processed through secure payment systems)

list.1: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, operating system, screen resolution
list.2: Usage Data: visit time, pages viewed, actions in the Service
list.3: Cookies: cookie files to improve the Service

4.title: 4. Purposes of Data Processing
4.text: We use your personal data for the following purposes:

table.col2: Creating and managing account, access to Service features
Usage analysis, development of new features
Fraud prevention, protection against unauthorized access

5.title: 5. Legal Basis for Processing
5.text: Personal data processing is carried out on the basis of:

list.1: Your consent when registering in the Service
list.2: Necessity to fulfill the contract (Terms of Service)

1.title: 6.1. When We Share Data
1.text: We may share your data with the following categories of recipients:

list.1: Payment Systems: to process payments (data is transmitted in encrypted form)
list.2: Cloud Services: for data storage and ensuring Service operation
list.3: AI Providers: for processing requests and generating content (data is anonymized)
list.5: Government Authorities: upon official requests in accordance with legislation

2.title: 6.2. International Data Transfer
2.text: Some of our partners may be located outside the Russian Federation. We ensure adequate protection of your data during cross-border transfer in accordance with legal requirements.

7.title: 7. Personal Data Protection
7.text: We apply modern technical and organizational measures to protect your data:

list.1: Encryption: SSL/TLS for data transmission, password encryption
list.2: Access Control: limited employee access to personal data

8.title: 8. Data Retention Period
8.text: We store your personal data for the following periods:

list.1: Account Data: until account deletion or consent withdrawal
list.2: Payment Information: in accordance with tax legislation requirements (minimum 5 years)
list.3: Logs and Technical Data: up to 1 year

9.title: 9. Your Rights
9.text: In accordance with applicable legislation, you have the following rights:

1.title: 9.1. Right to Access
1.text: You can request information about what personal data we process.

2.title: 9.2. Right to Rectification
2.text: You can correct inaccurate or incomplete data through account settings or by contacting support.

3.title: 9.3. Right to Erasure
3.text: You can request deletion of your personal data. Please note that some data may be retained in accordance with legislation.

4.title: 9.4. Right to Restriction of Processing
4.text: You can request restriction of processing your data in certain cases.

5.title: 9.5. Right to Withdraw Consent
5.text: You can withdraw consent to personal data processing at any time by contacting us using the contacts below.

6.title: 9.6. Right to Object
6.text: You can object to processing your data for marketing purposes.

1.title: 10.1. What Are Cookies
1.text: Cookies are small text files that are saved on your device when visiting the Service.

list.1: Necessary Cookies: ensure operation of basic Service functions
list.2: Functional Cookies: remember your preferences
list.3: Analytics Cookies: help understand how you use the Service
list.4: Advertising Cookies: used to show relevant advertising

3.title: 10.3. Managing Cookies
3.text: You can manage cookies through browser settings. Please note that disabling cookies may limit Service functionality.

11.title: 11. Children
11.text: The Service is not intended for persons under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal data of children. If you become aware that a child has provided us with their data, please contact us.

12.title: 12. Changes to the Policy
12.text: We may periodically update this Policy. We will notify you of significant changes through:

list.1: Notification in the Service
list.2: Email

12.note: The date of the last update is indicated at the beginning of the document.

13.title: 13. Contact Information
13.text: For all questions related to personal data processing, you can contact:

list.1: Operator: Individual Entrepreneur Kretsu Vasile
list.2: TIN: 772426525886

14.title: 14. Complaints to Supervisory Authority
14.text: If you believe your rights have been violated, you can contact the relevant data protection authority in your jurisdiction.

privacy.agreement: By using the Service, you confirm that you have read this Privacy Policy and agree to the terms of processing your personal data.
